config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
Content of relevant files.
Any errors in the generated code.
Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. Do not return files that have no changes. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt:
create a well styled beautiful component for an ecommerce product page. Include item photos, title, details, price, sizes. 
Use the URL https://source.unsplash.com/random for product image.
Also include user reviews. 
Pass any example data to the component using props. Also add an example of this component in the index page.
Add a backend API for fetching all the information for a product. The component should use the API to fetch a product given its id. For now, the backend API can return some sample data
Add a buy button. Make the UI alignment better. Use better styles and effects to make the product page really beautiful.
